word_mean: 热核：核反应(如氢核聚变)产生的热，反应所需的能量是以超常高温形式存在的

sentence.Network_en: The thermonuclear reactions of the sun energize the human body.
sentence.Network_cn: 太阳的热核反应给人类以能量.

sentence.Network_en: In this age of thermonuclear technology , neither view can assure man's preservation.
sentence.Network_cn: 在当今的热核技术时代, 这两种观点都不足以保障人类的生存.

sentence.Network_en: Nothing less than a fission bomb can ignite a thermonuclear reaction.
sentence.Network_cn: 威力比一个裂变炸弹小的任何东西都不能点燃热核反应.

entry.def: A thermo-nuclear weapon or device is one which uses the high temperatures that result from a nuclear reaction in order to cause it to explode.

means.word_mean: 1. using nuclear weapons based on fusion as distinguished from fission
